page.title: 20A Farmers day in June
page.content: He gets up in a morning at 7.00 goes into the bathroom and has a wash then he goes down stairs gets his shoes and coat on and goes to look at his brothers cattle in the field. After he has looked at the cattle he goes back home and has breakfast. Usually he goes and gets the tractor and spray, fills it with fungicide.From June he fortnightly sprays the potaoes against blight.After spraying he washes the sprayer and puts it away and goes to have dinner. After dinner he goes and works on the combine ready for harvest. Then he goes to Plats for some spare parts for the combine. By the time he gets back it is time for tea so he puts the spare parts ready for tomorrow. After tea we let the dogs out for a run. At different times of the year he harvests, burns stubble picks potatoes, ploughs and sows seed.
